channel.title: Yell colours for ranks [delta]
channel.description: Hey guys, how can i change the colour of my yells? e.g. dark ded for owner and blue for moderator, ive tried adding @dre@ and @blu@ etc before them

item.title: Yell colours for ranks [delta]
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

this is mine:


       if (c.playerRights == 1){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=65280>[DONATOR]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
       }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711680>[PREMIUM]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
       }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[INFO]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
       }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=16751360>[MODERATOR]</col><img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
      }else if (c.playerRights == 5){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=8421503>[HEAD MOD]</col><img=4>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
      }else if (c.playerRights == 6){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=10377472>[ADMINISTRATOR]</col><img=5>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
      }else if (c.playerRights == 7){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=16776960>[HEAD ADMIN]</col><img=6>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
      }else if (c.playerRights == 8){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=5963918>[CO-OWNER]</col><img=7>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
      }else if (c.playerRights == 9){
        c2.sendMessage("<shad=3853823>[OWNER]</col><img=8>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

mine works fine
